reviewText: This ruined 4 brand new never recorded on tapes not to mention what it's done to my VCR.  When I try to watch a movie now the screen jumps and there's no sound. This was never the problem before. The only problem I had before was the sound staying at one level which I could hear just fine, but it happens when it needs to be cleaned.
Followed directions to the tee but it wouldn't eject the tape. Now we have to buy a new VCR!!!
